TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindUITypeEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents a that is associated with the properties that are bound, or can be bound, on an activity.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
When users indicate that they want to edit property values, the **ActivityBind** dialog box opens to help in specifying the binding of properties on an activity.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EditValue (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider serviceProvider, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EditValue(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: An that can be used to gain additional context information.
An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that the editor can use to obtain services.
The value of the object to edit.
Docs.summary: Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>.
Docs.returns: The new value of the object.
Docs.exception: contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

Docs.summary: Returns the editor style used by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method.
Docs.returns: A value that indicates the style of editor used by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>.
